amendment.description: To determine the factors leading to significant tobacco-related disease and disproportionate health effects on tribal populations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4078 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4078 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S1040) To determine the factors leading to significant tobacco-related disease and disproportionate health effects on tribal populations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4078 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4078 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899.
